Products.Name: A pre-fabricated home in a shipping container
Products.Description: Who says you have to pay exorbitant broker fees to find the home of your dreams? You can make your dreams of homeownership come true as easily as you'd buy a bottle of dish soap, thanks to this storage-container-turned-house, available for a cool $36K.

Products.Name: 1,500 live ladybugs
Products.Description: Who says you can't buy anything for under $10 anymore? In fact, Amazon shoppers can buy 1,500 crawling, flying somethings for the bargain price of a latte.

Products.Name: A cat butt tissue holder
Products.Description: This seems like the nicest thing to be plucked from a cat's rear since, well, ever. And who doesn't like to be stared down with peering, inquisitive eyes each time they need to blow their nose?

Products.Name: A baby mop
Products.Description: It's never too early to teach your children about chores, as evidenced by this suit that lets your baby mop the house for you.

Products.Name: Dancing with Cats
Products.Description: If you truly love your pet, you'll do anything for them, or with themâ€”including interpretive dance, according to this book.
